EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Draconic Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Draconic Soul, whose element will determine your power in the rest of this tree.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soul of the Black Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have chosen to commune with a Black Dragon's soul, granting the power of Acid to abilities in this tree. Passive: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soul of the Blue Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have chosen to commune with a Blue Dragon's soul, granting the power of Electricity to abilities in this tree. Passive: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soul of the Green Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have chosen to commune with a Green Dragon's soul, granting the power of Poison to abilities in this tree. Passive: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soul of the Red Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have chosen to commune with a Red Dragon's soul, granting the power of Fire to abilities in this tree. Passive: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Soul of the White Dragon
EnhancementSelection.Description: You have chosen to commune with a White Dragon's soul, granting the power of Cold to abilities in this tree. Passive: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Draconic Arms
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Imbue Toggle: Your Draconic Soul emboldens your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 damage on each hit in the element of your Draconic Soul. This damage scales with 200% of the higher of Melee or Ranged Power.
Passive: The bonus of each of your Draconic Auras is increased by 1.

Stance.Name: Soul of the Dragon: [Selected Dragon Type]
Stance.Description: Imbue Toggle: Your Draconic Soul emboldens your weapon strikes, which deal 1d6 damage on each hit in the element of your Draconic Soul. This damage scales with 200% of the higher of Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Reckless Devotion
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Activate: Target Ally gains a Morale bonus to Critical Confirmation and Critical Hit Damage equal to 1 + a quarter of your Dragon Lord level for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 20 seconds.
Passive: +1 Imbue Die, +5 Melee and Ranged Power, +3 to Critical Confirmation and Critical Hit Damage. The bonus of each of your Draconic Auras is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Conqueror's Command
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
When you use Reckless Devotion, the power of your Draconic command grants that ally the effects of the Panacea spell, curing many afflictions and healing that ally for 1d6+2 Hit Points plus 1 per Dragon Lord level. This healing scales with 200% of Melee Power.
Passive: +1 Imbue Die. The bonus of each of your Draconic Auras is increased by 1.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Dragon's Defense
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
While you have any Draconic Aura active, you and nearby allies gain a +3 Morale Bonus to Elemental Resistance and +5% Morale Bonus to Elemental Absorption of the element of your Draconic Soul.
Passive: +1 Imbue Dice. +10 Melee and Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Sunder Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Deals +50% Damage Cooldown: 20 seconds Sundered enemies in a small area in front of you must make a Will saving throw (DC 10 + Highest of STR and CHA mod + Sunder bonuses) or have their Soul sundered, killing them instantly.
Passive: +2 Strength, +2 Charisma, +10 Melee and Ranged Power, +2 Imbue Die. The bonus of all of your Draconic Auras increases by 2.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Dragon's Protection I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +3 Resistance to the element of your Draconic Soul.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Battlefield Tactician I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Unbreakable Will
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Will Saving Throws.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Field Skills
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2/3] to Intimidate, Jump, and Haggle. Rank 3: You gain +2 to Attack.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Martial Superiority
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select an advantage with weapons.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Dragon Lord: Martial Superiority: Deft Strikes
Dragon Lord: Martial Superiority: Improved Second Strikes
Dragon Lord: Martial Superiority: Shoot Twice
Dragon Lord: Martial Superiority: Strike Twice

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Dragon's Protection II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional +3 Resistance to the element of your Draconic Soul.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Battlefield Tactician II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Draconic Resilience
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[2/4/6] Natural Armor

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Action Boost
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select Haste or Tactics Boost

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Haste
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[10/20/30]% Action Boost bonus to attack speed for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Action Boost: Tactics
EnhancementSelection.Description: Activate to gain a +[3/6/9] Action Boost bonus to Tactical DCs for 20 seconds. Cooldown: 30 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Dragonslayer
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
You have chosen to assert dominance over Dragons, despite sharing in their power. You gain Favored Enemy: Dragon.
When fighting a Favored Enemy, you gain +2 Damage for each Favored Enemy feat you have. If you have more than one Favored Enemy feat that applies to a particular Enemy, the damage applies for each type that matches your Favored Enemy feat you have.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Dragon's Protection III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional +3 Resistance and +5% Absorption to the element of your Draconic Soul.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Battlefield Tactician III
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +1 to Tactical Feat DCs and Breath Weapon DCs. When you attack with Trip or Sunder (or their Improved variants), you deal 1d4 additional damage per Character Level of the Element of you Draconic Soul. This damage scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Dragon's Roar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Tactical Feat: Enemies in a cone ahead of you must make a Will Saving Throw (DC 10 + Highest of STR and CHA mod + Stunning bonuses + Breath Weapon DC bonuses) or be Dazed. Affected enemies have a 25% chance to be broken out of Daze on damage. Cooldown: 20 seconds

DC.Name: Dragon's Roar
DC.Description: Enemies in a cone ahead of you must make a Will Saving Throw (DC 10 + Highest of STR and CHA mod + Stunning bonuses + Breath Weapon DC bonuses) or be Dazed. Affected enemies have a 25% chance to be broken out of Daze on damage.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Might or Outburst
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select a Trance.

EnhancementSelection.Name: Draconic Conviction
EnhancementSelection.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonuses to Attack, Damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. When you use Dragon's Roar, you have a chance to restore 1 charge. Cooldown: 20 seconds

Stance.Name: Draconic Conviction
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonuses to Attack, Damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Charisma modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. When you use Dragon's Roar, you have a chance to restore 1 charge. Cooldown: 20 seconds

EnhancementSelection.Name: Might in Order
EnhancementSelection.Description: Cooldown: 20 seconds Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonuses to attack, Damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Strength modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. Each time you successfully use Trip, Sunder, Stunning Blow, or Dragon's Roar (or their Improved variants), you have a chance to restore 1 charge.

Stance.Name: Might in Order
Stance.Description: Battle Trance: You gain an Insight bonuses to attack, Damage and the DC of tactical feats equal to 1/2 of your Strength modifier for [30/60/120] seconds. When you use Dragon's Roar, you have a chance to restore 1 charge.

Effect.DisplayName: Dragon Lord: Might in Order (Str Mod / 2)
Dragon Lord: Might in Order (Str Mod / 2)

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Ability Score I
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select between Strength or Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Dragon's Protection IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain an additional +3 Resistance and +5% Absorption to the element of your Draconic Soul.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Battlefield Tactician IV
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
+1 to Tactical Feat DCs and Breath Weapon DCs. When you Sunder enemies, it makes them vulnerable to the element of your Draconic Soul for 10 seconds.
Additionally, if you successfully Sunder (or Improved Sunder) a target under the effects of Trip (or Improved Trip), that target takes an additional 1d6 damage per Character Level of the Element of you Draconic Soul. This damage scales with 200% Melee or Ranged Power.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Untouchable Soul
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You have Displacement, giving opponents a 50% chance to miss you due to concealment. This cannot be dispelled.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Lead the Charge
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Deals +[20/30/50]% Damage Cooldown: 12 seconds Melee Rush Attack: Rush forward up to 30 feet to your selected opponent and deliver a mighty strike. Shares a cooldown with Shield Charge.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Ability Score II
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Select between Strength or Charisma.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Soul Scales
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: You gain +15 Magical Resistance Rating. +25% Competence Bonus to Maximum HP, ans you have a 5% chance to ignore damage of the element of your Draconic Soul.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Tactical Commander
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: The cooldowns of your Trip, Sunder, Stunning Blow, and Dragon's Roar (and their Improved variants) are reduced by 33%. +2 to Breath Weapon DCs.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Improved Dragon's Roar
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: Your Dragon's Roar now Cowers enemies instead of Dazing them. In addition, when you use Dragon's Roar, you gain a +20% Morale bonus to damage vs. Helpless targets for 20 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Flight of Kings
EnhancementTreeItem.Description:
Memories of flight lie within you. You are able to leap through the air to bring the fight to your enemies or traverse chasms that make normal adventure's balk. Cooldown: 15 seconds
When you use Flight of Kings, you gain a +20% Action Boost bonus to Movement Speed for 6 seconds.

EnhancementTreeItem.Name: Dragon Lord: Conqueror
EnhancementTreeItem.Description: +[1/2] Competence Bonus to Critical Multiplier with All Weapons.
